keyPolicies.policyDescription: Deliver an NHS with the time to care - by providing 8,000 more doctors and 20,000 more nurses.
Cut the deficit more fairly by asking those earning over £150,000 to contribute a little more through a 50p rate of tax.
Guarantee a GP appointment within 48 hours or on the same day for those who need it.
Raise the Minimum Wage to £8 an hour and ban exploitative zero hour contracts.
Get at least 200,000 homes a year built by 2020 and deliver a fairer deal for private renters.

issues.economy: Cut the deficit more fairly by asking those earning over £150,000 to contribute a little more through a 50p rate of tax.
issues.health: Guarantee a GP appointment within 48 hours or on the same day for those who need it.

housing.content: Get at least 200,000 homes a year built by 2020 and deliver a fairer deal for private renters.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Protecting the NHS. Tackling the cost-of-living crisis.
